ModMetaData.name: Linux Performance Optimizations
ModMetaData.author: Anten Skrabec
ModMetaData.description:
Performance optimizations for RimWorld on Linux.
Features: • CPU Affinity - Pin game to specific cores with hybrid CPU detection (P-cores vs E-cores) • Transparent Huge Pages (THP) - Use 2MB pages for improved memory performance • Memory Prefaulting - Pre-fault memory pages to reduce stuttering (kernel 5.14+) • File I/O Hints - Optimize file-backed memory for faster save/load operations • GameMode Integration - Activate Feral's gamemode performance optimizations
All features are enabled automatically on startup and can be configured in mod settings. Gracefully does nothing on Windows/macOS.
Source: https://github.com/cebarks/rimworld-linux-misc
